name: Pippu Ski Resort
description: Pippu Ski Resort, located near Asahikawa in Hokkaido, offers a family-friendly atmosphere with a hidden delight for powder hounds. On a powder day, the resort becomes a haven for deep snow enthusiasts, offering a nearly private skiing experience. This quaint resort features 9 runs, 330 meters of vertical, and 3 lifts. The main thrill here is off-piste and sidecountry skiing, making Pippu an ideal destination for those looking to explore backcountry terrain and improve their skills.
